content.message: Hi, I recently received a product that was damaged upon arrival. Can you please explain your return policy for damaged items?

Hello! I’m really sorry to hear that your product arrived damaged. Let me walk you through our return policy for such situations.

If you received a damaged item, we want to make things right as quickly as possible. Here’s what you need to do:

Report the Issue: Please report the damage within 30 days of receiving your product. You can do this by contacting our customer support team via phone, email, or live chat, whichever is most convenient for you.

Provide Details: We’ll need some information to process your return. Please provide your order number, a description of the damage, and photos of the damaged item and its packaging. This helps us assess the situation and prevent it from happening in the future.

Return or Exchange: Once we’ve reviewed your report, we’ll offer you two options:

Replacement: We can send you a replacement item at no additional cost.
Refund: If you prefer, we can issue a full refund, including any shipping fees you may have paid.

Return Shipping: In most cases, we’ll provide you with a prepaid return label if we need the damaged item back. You can use this label to send the item back to us at no cost to you. If the item is small and not worth returning, we might ask you to dispose of it instead.

Processing Time: After we receive the damaged item (if a return is needed) or confirm the damage from your photos, we’ll process the refund or ship the replacement within 3-5 business days. You’ll receive a confirmation email once this is done.

Tracking: If you choose a replacement, we’ll provide you with tracking information once it’s shipped so you can follow its progress.

If you have any other questions or need further assistance, please let me know. We’re here to help and want to make sure you’re fully satisfied with your purchase.
Thank you for the detailed explanation. I’ll go ahead and send the photos along with my order number. I think I’ll go for a replacement.

That sounds good! Once we receive your photos, we’ll get started on the replacement right away. Thanks for your patience, and we’re sorry again for the inconvenience. We’ll make sure the new product arrives in perfect condition!

content.product_description: Elevate your audio experience with the SonicWave Bluetooth Speaker, the ultimate companion for music lovers on the go. Whether you're at the beach, by the pool, or just relaxing at home, this speaker delivers powerful, crystal-clear sound in a compact, stylish design.

key_features.description: Enjoy uninterrupted music all day long with a robust battery that keeps the tunes playing for up to 10 hours on a single charge. Perfect for those long days out, parties, or extended listening sessions.

Built to withstand the elements, the SonicWave is fully waterproof, making it ideal for outdoor adventures. Rain or splash, your music never stops. Rated IPX7, this speaker can even be submerged in water without missing a beat.
Despite its compact size, the SonicWave delivers deep bass, crisp highs, and rich mid-tones, giving you a full-spectrum audio experience that’s perfect for any genre.
Designed with portability in mind, the SonicWave fits easily into your bag or backpack. Take your music anywhere, from a picnic in the park to a weekend camping trip.
Express your style with three vibrant color options. Choose from sleek Black, vibrant Blue, or bold Red to match your personality or mood.

Seamlessly connect to your smartphone, tablet, or laptop with the latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology, ensuring a stable connection and extended range, so you can keep the music going without interruption.

content.summary: The SonicWave Bluetooth Speaker is the perfect blend of durability, portability, and superior sound quality, all wrapped in a sleek, waterproof design. Available in three stunning colors, it’s more than just a speaker; it’s your ticket to a better audio experience, wherever life takes you.

content.question: How long will it take for my order to arrive?
content.answer:
We offer several shipping options to fit your needs:

Standard Shipping: Typically takes 5-7 business days.
Express Shipping: Usually arrives within 2-3 business days.
Overnight Shipping: Delivered the next business day if ordered before 12 PM (noon).
Please note that shipping times may vary during holidays or sales events. We’ll send you a tracking number once your order ships so you can follow its progress.

content.question: Do you offer international shipping?
content.answer: Yes, we ship to many countries worldwide. International shipping times vary by location, generally taking 7-14 business days. Please be aware that customs fees and import duties may apply, which are the responsibility of the customer.

content.question: How can I track my order?
content.answer: Once your order is shipped, we’ll send you an email with your tracking number and a link to track your package. You can also track your order by logging into your account on our website and navigating to the 'My Orders' section.

content.question: What is your return policy?
content.answer: We want you to love your purchase! If you’re not completely satisfied, you can return items within 30 days of receiving your order for a full refund or exchange. Items must be in their original condition, unworn, and with all tags attached.

content.question: How do I return an item?
content.answer:
To return an item, follow these steps:

1. Log in to your account and go to the 'My Orders' section.
2. Select the order you wish to return and click 'Start a Return.'
3. Print the prepaid return label we provide and attach it to your package.
4. Drop the package off at your nearest shipping location.
Once we receive and inspect your return, we’ll process your refund within 5-7 business days.

content.question: Can I exchange an item?
content.answer: Yes, exchanges are available for the same item in a different size or color, subject to availability. Follow the same steps as a return, and select 'Exchange' during the process. If the desired item is unavailable, we’ll issue a full refund.

content.question: How do I find the right size?
content.answer: We provide detailed sizing guides for all our products. You can find the size chart on each product page, just below the item description. The chart includes measurements for bust, waist, hips, and inseam, helping you choose the best fit.

content.question: What if I'm between sizes?
content.answer: If you’re between sizes, we recommend checking the product description for any specific fit details (e.g., 'runs small' or 'oversized'). If you’re still unsure, you might consider ordering the larger size, as some styles may shrink slightly after washing.

content.question: Do you offer plus sizes?
content.answer: Yes, we’re proud to offer a wide range of sizes, including plus sizes. You can filter your search by size on our website to easily find styles that suit your needs.

content.question: Can I change or cancel my order after it’s been placed?
content.answer: We process orders quickly to ensure timely delivery, so there’s a limited window to make changes. If you need to change or cancel your order, please contact our customer service team as soon as possible. We’ll do our best to accommodate your request.

content.question: What payment methods do you accept?
content.answer: We accept major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and Apple Pay. All transactions are secure, and your payment information is encrypted for your safety.

content.question: How can I contact customer service?
content.answer: You can reach our customer service team via email, phone, or live chat. Visit our 'Contact Us' page for detailed contact information and hours of operation. We’re here to help with any questions or concerns you may have.
